definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: In the blood the fatty acid and the ketone body big trough increase when.
sentences.chinese: 血中脂肪酸和酮體大盆增加時。

sentences.english: She blundered when she added up the bill.
sentences.chinese: 她把賬款相加時弄錯了。

sentences.english: The score is a draw, it's going to go into overtime.
sentences.chinese: 比分打平，比賽將進入加時賽。

sentences.english: As water levels increase, the wall retracts up forming a barrier.
sentences.chinese: 水位增加時，該牆撤回起來，形成一個障礙。

sentences.english: The rare earth magnet thickness decreases to improve the performance when pole numbers increase.
sentences.chinese: 極對數增加時，減小磁鋼厚度能提高電機的性價比。

sentences.english: They won the match after a sudden-death play-off.
sentences.chinese: 加時賽中以突然死亡法贏得了比賽。

sentences.english: Jamison didn't score in the overtime, missing all four of his shots.
sentences.chinese: 加時賽賈米森四投零中未得分。

sentences.english: The change in stools starts when wheat and other gluten-containing foods are added.
sentences.chinese: 當麥和其他含谷膠食物增加時大便就會發生變化。

sentences.english: Conversely, the exchange value will fall when there is more money.
sentences.chinese: 相反，貨幣供應量增加時，交換價值將下降。

sentences.english: The title was decided by a sudden-death play-off.
sentences.chinese: 冠軍是由突然死亡法的加時賽決定的。

sentences.english: As font size is increased, the height of the navigation bar increases.
sentences.chinese: 當字體大小增加時，導航條的高度會隨着增加。

sentences.english: They were forced to face another overtime without their leading scorer.
sentences.chinese: 他們的頭號得分手不在，現在要面對第二個加時。

sentences.english: They scored all 12 of Miami's points in overtime;
sentences.chinese: 他們包攬了加時賽中熱火的全部12分。

sentences.english: They began this week by outlasting the Washington Wizards in overtime Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 週日加時擊敗奇才之後，湖人將要開始本週的比賽。

sentences.english: The match ended 1-1 after extra time.
When pressure is increased, the ancroid is squeezed, so it shortens.
sentences.chinese: 當大氣壓力增加時，膜盒壓緊而縮短。

definition: (sports) to go out of bounds/to go over the line/to qualify for the next round of competition/(Tw) (fig.) to make the grade/to achieve success
to win by a narrow margin/to barely win/narrow victory
Vanuatu, country in the southwestern Pacific Ocean
to mess sth up/to screw up
St Paul/São Paulo, city in Brazil
lit. to win a victory on raising the flag (idiom); fig. to start on sth and have immediate success/success in a single move
to nurse a grievance/to harbor a grudge
